content: *want to live in the shire me too this pattern is my attempt to bring the joy of the shire to knitter s backyards * this playful design consists of a door windows and chimney the door and windows are double-sided so there is no need to block my hope is that hobbit holes spring up all over the world and that they bring the peace of the shire with them need some hobbit-sized pumpkins to go beside your hobbit doors check out my brand new fairytale pumpkin pattern 1 there s also lots of other great accessories on my freebies page 2 **construction** the door and windows are knit entirely in the round on dpns beginning at the center back and ending with pretty decreases at the center front the door knob and window frame are made with embroidery the chimney is also knit in the round it is flipped inside out so you don t have to do all those pesky purl stitches i have also included a fun photo tutorial on how to construct your own earthen hobbit hole 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/fairytale-pumpkins-2 2 https //www ravelry com/bundles/freebies-78
